about_the_game:
"Ghost in the pool" Original Art Gallery
The Original Art Gallery contains many original concept arts for the game created and adapted by Joey.
As a benefit, the complete original comic content of the “Ghost in the pool” in the 诡闻斋 series of comics is also included.
"诡闻斋"
is a collection of horror comics created by Joey.
The comics bring together many independent horror stories.
As the first game version of the series, we chose the ultra-short comic “Ghost in the pool” as the prologue of the 诡闻斋 series.
There will be more exciting and longer games available in the future.
I hope you can continue to pay attention to the development of CASCHA GAMES.

The Artbook DLC are 2 PDF files, after purchase, you can find them in the local installation directory of the Steam "Ghost in the pool" game.
